lines: "description": "A simple API to learn how to write OpenAPI Specification"
"description": "A simple API to learn how to write OpenAPI Specification"
"description": "the content for the post or comment",
"description": "gives count of each reaction acted on a post",
"description": "using the content in the request body post is created by user",
"description": "comment is created for the post with the content in the body",
"summary": "reply is created for the valid comment",
"description": "reply is created tto the comment using the content from the body",
"description": "creating reaction to post using reaction from request body",
"description": "creating reaction to comment using reaction from request body",
"summary": "gives total reactions counts for all posts and comments ",
"summary": "gives count for each reaction to post",
"description": "metrics for each reaction of a post is fetched.",
"description": "to get post with more positive reactions",
"description": "retrives list of post ids with more possitive reactions",
